text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @ICEgov You’ve been talking about fighting MS-13, who most of us never heard of, for 3.5 yrs & apparently haven’t done a good job of it.

I suggest that you try the death by #coronavirus route that you have successfully used on the rest of us? 137,000 dead & counting
